title: You’ll Love This Sweet Potato Veggie Scramble Recipe
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
This week, your friends at Chino Valley Ranchers have whipped up a nutritious, healthy breakfast recipe to kick-start your day! Add some color to your morning with this sweet potato veggie scramble. Made with all-natural, Chino Valley Ranchers’ egg whites and fresh vegetables, this dish will make your taste buds dance! Plus, it makes for great leftovers the next day. Continue reading for the full recipe!

What You’ll Need:

  • Chino Valley Ranchers’ egg whites
  • Olive oil
  • Diced sweet potato
  • Chopped green bell pepper
  • Minced garlic
  • Chopped fresh spinach
  • Chopped green onion

Optional Ingredients:

  • Salt & pepper
  • Chopped fresh parsley

1. Prepare the potatoes.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the sweet potato, bell pepper and minced garlic, and cook until the potatoes are tender and crisp. Make sure to leave the skillet covered, but stir the ingredients occasionally.

2. Whisk the egg whites.

Once your potatoes are tender, add the chopped spinach and mix it around until it’s wilted. In a separate bowl, whisk your Chino Valley Ranchers egg whites with the chopped green onion and parsley until fully combined.

3. Scramble together.Make room in the center of the skillet and pour in the egg mixture. Scramble everything together until the egg whites are cooked through. When it’s ready, sprinkle some salt and pepper and serve with toast. Can’t finish it all in one sitting? Just refrigerate your scramble and heat it up the next day – It’s as simple as that!
